articles.content:

articles.title: Spectacular 'meteor shower' over SA was actually a 'bolide' - Independent Online
articles.description: What many South Africans thought was a spectacular meteor shower early on Tuesday evening was actually a “bolide”, a very bright meteor that often explodes on entry into the Earth’s atmosphere and can be seen over a wide expanse.
articles.content:

articles.title: Zambia new president sworn in on pledge to repair economy, rights - Guardian Nigeria
